# load library
```{python}
import pandas as pd
```

# import full dataset
```{python}
drug_info = pd.read_csv("ORIG_ASCII/DRUG25Q4.txt", sep = "$")

drug_info.head()
drug_info.tail()

len(drug_info) #1815349 rows

```

# filter dataset by only showing isotretinoin brands
```{python}
isotretinoin_brands = [
    "ROACCUTANE",
    "ACCUTANE",
    "CLARAVIS",
    "AMNESTEEM",
    "SOTRET",
    "ABSORICA",
    "MYORISAN",
    "ZENATANE"
]

iso_drugs = drug_info[drug_info["drugname"].isin(isotretinoin_brands)]
iso_drugs.head(30)

len(iso_drugs) #590 rows

```

# DRUG file has different drug roles: PS = Primary Suspect, SS = Secondary Suspect, C = Concomitant, I = Interacting
# Only include PS
```{python}
ps_iso_drugs = iso_drugs[iso_drugs["role_cod"] == "PS"]
ps_iso_drugs.head(30)

len(ps_iso_drugs) # 365 rows
```

# save cleaned isotretinoin drug data
```{python}
ps_iso_drugs.to_csv("ISO_DRUG_INFO.txt", sep = "$")
```
